column5: We had our thankgiving holiday down here in the states this past weekend, and i enjoyed many willing fish all four days and even fit in a turkey feast with the family in between  Just a couple pics  btw, these are pretty decent cellphone pics taken with the iphone 4s........pretty crispy compared to my old flip phone lol
I'm thankful that you shared this with me !!!Great fish!   Paul
Outstanding bud, nice to see you took advantage of the mini holliday.  I considered crossing the border to fish, then thought better of it. Border delays were horrendous this past long weekend.

Welcome Merc  And Mike,  Mother nature couldnt have timed the long weekend better.  Water was perfect as it was just coming down from a good rain early last week. The fishing was just silly at times lol.
